title: league of legends launcher not working (help)
body: For some reason whenever I try to click league of legends to play it always say this "The application was unable to start correctly (0xc00000e5). Click OK to close the application" and I have no clue what to do this problem or how to fix it and I need help about this application thing? (also not only this thing is happening in league its also happening to all of my apps like discord,spotify,starcraft2 and etc.)

replies.body: There's a good number of things that could be causing this since you're not able to open those other programs as well. Let's first make sure that you've got the latest update for windows to make sure that your OS is working properly. Also check out this [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to confirm that your OS has all the right permissions in place to let League launch.
